recipesJson.name: Dobber's Grape Drank
recipesJson.author: KaptinKaos
recipesJson.description:
My take on a classic grape soda.

Obviously the FW Grape Soda takes center stage, but INW Grapes and a tiny FW Grape boost were needed for my palette.

Feel free to add koolada or ws-23 for your own palette. This is 100% a SNV, no steep needed.

Cheers!

reviews.text: This blows famous Purple Drank away. I liked the original but this version is way better - less sweet, a little more flavorful. Nice job!
